file_content.text: Stop. It's time we talked.
I am the master of the Foundry. Once the Emperor's prisoner, now the man you've come to destroy.
Open this door and face me.
Come out of hiding.
I don't want to fight you.
What do you have to say?
I'm here to take the station. You happen to be in my way.
Killing you is just a bonus.
Maybe you believe that, but your masters have other priorities.
Three hundred years ago, I found your Empire in the stars and stood against the Emperor himself. I was betrayed. Defeated.
I paid the price as the Emperor ravaged my mind over centuries... but I gave him nothing. I am proof that the dark side can be resisted.
You say you're a Jedi, you say you fought the Emperor....
Who were you?
In my time, servants of the Sith invaded the Republic. I gave up everything to seek their masters, and I discovered Dromund Kaas.
Not every Sith gives in to temptation. I know the resolve of the light.
I resist the dark side, too.
I'm a bounty hunter. Dark and light aren't worth much in my business.
Mysticism isn't my concern.
This isn't just about Jedi and Sith.
Sometimes, all it takes is the will. Any power can be fought.
I know how to resist Sith.
Then you understand what I'm doing here.
You haven't resisted anything. The Emperor let you go, and you led us straight to the Foundry.
Fool. This was all a trap.
Your masters are hiding the truth--they don't dare to show weakness. Listen to me.
I've seen the Emperor's corruption--he and everything he's built must be destroyed, or the galaxy will suffer forever.
You don't need to die with him. Surrender, and you can wait out this war as comfortable prisoners.
You don't need to die with him. Surrender, and you can wait out this war as a comfortable prisoner.
Life as a prisoner wasn't good enough for you. You really think I'm going to give up?
Are you serious?
I hoped.
Talk to me. We can work for peace together.
We should be allies, not foes.
I've been betrayed one time too many.
You're a dead man.
You leave me no choice but to turn the Foundry against you.
These machines are extermination droids--my infinite army. Farewell.
